# CHANGELOG - disk

1.0.2 / 2017-10-10
==================

### Changes

* [BUGFIX] Skip now works with NFS secure mounts too. See [#470][].

1.0.1 / 2017-07-18
==================

### Changes

* [SANITY] Import `Platform` helper from `utils.platform` instead of deprecated `util`. See [#484][]

1.0.0 / 2017-03-22
==================

### Changes

* [FEATURE] adds disk integration.
